column6: SEVEN THE HARD WAY PART 4 Wolverine's plans have hit a snag. With Romulus breathing down his neck, Wolverine struggles to get his last piece on the board. And the fact that she's in prison doesn't exactly make it any easier...
column8: | penciller:Doug Braithwaite | letterer:Cory Petit | inker:Bill Reinhold | colorist:Andy Troy | writer:Daniel Way
